turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi I'd like to order a coffee drink please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. What drink would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm feeling like a sweet coffee beverage.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: There's a Starbucks on Castro Street nearby.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That sounds good. I'll get a drink from there.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which coffee drink do you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do they still offer mocha beverages.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes there are mocha beverages on the menu.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well I'm thinking about the cherry mocha, I've been wanting to try it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Should I order you a cherry mocha from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: But I really LOVE the Black and White mochas, that's what I think I want today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You want to order a black and white mocha from Starbucks today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, just one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm actually feeling like a venti size right now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: One venti size black and white mocha from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, and with 1% milk and whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order is for one venti size Black and White Mocha with 1% milk and whipped cream from the Starbucks on Castro St in Mountain View.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes thats it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: An order has been placed at the Starbucks on Castro St in Mountain View, for one venti Black and White Mocha with 1% milk and whipped cream,

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via a text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. Thank you for your help

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you
